experience.title: Group Manager Global Media Production
experience.description: Leading the global media production unit with responsibility for team management in 2D and 3D, process alignment, and international coordination. Oversight of the CMX brand rebranding, DAM system management, and the development of tailored Python tools to enhance automation and workflow efficiency.
achievements: Cross-department collaboration (Corporate Communications, Events, R&D, Education, HR)

experience.title: Teamlead Global Media Production
experience.description: Directed day-to-day media production activities with a focus on process optimization and creative workflow improvements. Introduced and rolled out a new DAM system, and created Python scripts to automate recurring tasks.
achievements: Department collaboration (Corporate Communications, Events, R&D, Education, HR)

experience.title: CMX Designer
experience.description: Direct support for physicians, practices, and hospitals in surgical planning. Design of patient-specific implants, drill and cutting guides, and bone models for reconstruction, correction, and revision. Modeling with Freeform, segmentation with Mimics, and continuous process improvement through COP.
achievements: Surgery support from order to operation

experience.title: Senior Digital Media Designer
experience.description: Comprehensive digital and print media production including catalogs, product information, surgical techniques, trade show booths, websites, presentations, and photography. Specialized in 3D visuals, animations, and WebGL interactive visualizations for medical products and surgical education.
achievements: Print production: catalogs, product information, surgical techniques, trade show materials
Digital: website design, social media, PowerPoint templates, PDF forms
Photography: Corporate, Products, Portraits, Events, Cadaveric Workshops & Surgeries
3D: visuals and animations (teasers, trailers, surgical techniques, educational content)
WebGL: interactive product and booth visualizations
Corporate Design: development, enhancement, and maintenance

experience.title: Editor of Images (Bildredaktor)
experience.description: Picture Editor in the Press/Layout department. Editing and sourcing photos from agencies, commissioning photographers, and supporting studio and on-location shoots. Close collaboration with editors of all Coop publications including newspaper, employee magazine, and Pronto-News.

experience.title: Deputy Head of Editorial Production
experience.description: Production of editorial content, integration of PR production into the editorial department, development and implementation of a new newspaper concept. Writing of editorial articles, realization of people reportages, photography for front stories, supervision of production processes and interns.
achievements: Editorial content production and PR integration
New newspaper concept development and implementation

experience.title: Head of PR Production (Producer Commercial Content)
experience.description: Realization and production of PR articles, inserts and commercials for clients. Production of in-house sales documents, photography, PR text writing, and client support. Supervision of entire production process from concept to delivery.

experience.title: Layout, Photography, Graphics & Customer Service
experience.description: Comprehensive graphic design and production services including commercials, brochures, newsletters, magazines, POS materials, posters, flyers, business cards, public reports, and newspaper inserts. Graphics, text creation, photography, advanced image processing, web administration, and data archiving.
achievements: Layout design for diverse print materials
Photography and image processing (RAW, masking, cropping, retouching, color profiles)

testimonials.quote: See the breadth, delve into the depth. I use all my experience to live up to this principle.
testimonials.author: Eduard Lorenz

testimonials.quote: I possess both the imagination and the technical skills to move purposefully from idea to concept to implementation.
testimonials.author: Eduard Lorenz

testimonials.quote: I can approach tasks in a multidisciplinary way to create unique, innovative and sustainable solutions.
testimonials.author: Eduard Lorenz

testimonials.quote: My colleagues and friends appreciate my open-mindedness, my unconditional loyalty, my motivating commitment, my versatile creativity and last but not least my sense of humor.
testimonials.author: Colleagues & Friends

testimonials.quote: What you have created and done for this meeting is beyond what anyone could have hoped for. Your attitude, talent and dedication is unmatched - and always with a positive mindset.
testimonials.author: Karina Schollhammer
testimonials.role: Global Vice President Marketing & Medical Education

testimonials.quote: It's a masterpiece! Thank you for the trust and dedication. Outstanding work that exceeded all expectations.
testimonials.author: Peter Lorenz

testimonials.quote: Awesome work on the CMX product documentation and entrance design. I love the attention to detail and creative approach.
testimonials.author: Shane Feng

testimonials.quote: Klasse, du bist der Beste! Herzlichen Dank Eduard!
testimonials.author: Ralph Mosimann

testimonials.quote: Winner of the Medartis Spirit Award for exceptional engagement and committed work on the corporate website launch, including presentation of new corporate branding visuals.
testimonials.author: Medartis AG

testimonials.quote: Led a brownbag workshop on Generative AI, sharing insights and practical applications with colleagues to foster innovation and AI literacy within the organization.
testimonials.author: Eduard Lorenz

about.description:
See the breadth, delve into the depth. I use all my experience to live up to this principle. My range of experience includes work for agencies, media as well as the industry. With a focus on creativity, my skillset as a graphic artist, photographer, 3D artist and designer expands with each new challenge.

With an eye for detail and a love of language, I indulge my great passion for communication in all its facets. I possess both the imagination and the technical skills to move purposefully from idea to concept to implementation. I can think both broadly and deeply about my tasks, and I can approach them in a multidisciplinary way to create unique, innovative and sustainable solutions.

My colleagues and friends appreciate my open-mindedness, my unconditional loyalty, my motivating commitment, my versatile creativity and last but not least my sense of humor.
about.quote: See the breadth, delve into the depth. I use all my experience to live up to this principle.
personalQuotes: I possess both the imagination and the technical skills to move purposefully from idea to concept to implementation.
I can approach tasks in a multidisciplinary way to create unique, innovative and sustainable solutions.
